title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.3 - Speeding prohibition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 164.3 - Speeding prohibition

State Regulations

When the operation of a vehicle involves the traversing of
a highway work area, such operation in excess of the posted temporary speed
limit shall be unlawful. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
164.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
